description: small jar with blue and white flower design; small crooked zigzag bands around widest part of jar and around neck; top has solid blue tip, then leafy design followed by zigzag design and painted light brown edge; coiled design near bottom
markings: on side, on label: [29D]; on bottom: collector\'s label
object_name: Covered jar, from a three-piece garniture set
title: Covered jar, from a three-piece garniture set
